posts.post_title: Very Nice T206's for sale plus some M116 Blue
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Joe Jones
Please take a look at my site to see the cards. All cards have been cracked out of the grading holders but I guarantee them to grade numerically. I have saved the flips if you are interested to know which comapny graded them and what the grade was. I have made the scans Large and High resolution so you can see the condition clearly.

First to say "I will take it" gets it.

Thank You

Joe Jones
